name: The Adventures of Derek: Truth and Lies
name_original: The Adventures of Derek: Truth and Lies
description:
These is a game for Brackey's Community Game Jam, following the theme The Game Is A Liar. In this game, you are a stick figure named Derek, who is stuck in a series of mazes. You have to help Derek escape out of the mazes. There are people to help Derek escape, but some of them are lying and some are telling the truth! You have to decide who is lying and who is not to make it through the maze.

Make it through all 4 mazes to win!
